vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Chongqing New North Zone
title: Blissful Chongqing Escape Overlooking Golf Course and City Horizon
description: Discover a peaceful retreat in the heart of Chongqing with a stay at Crowne Plaza Chongqing New North Zone, an IHG Hotel, nestled amidst a lush golf course. This elegant city is home to an array of intriguing landscapes, from inspiring architecture to tranquil river scenes. Take a moment to enjoy the beautiful greenery and cityscape from the rooftop patio, take a dip in the sleek indoor swimming pool and enjoy a bespoke treatment at the day spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chongqing New North Zone, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Longhuai Street, Economic & Technological Dev Park, Chongqing 401122, China

title: Chongqing Urban Glamour with Two Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Luxe Spa
description:
Step into the heart of Chongqing’s vibrant Jiangbei District, where this contemporary retreat places you steps from the lively Guanyinqiao Pedestrian Street and its upscale shopping. This five-star haven is a beacon of elegance, with its sleek architecture and refined interiors offering a tranquil sanctuary amid an ever-bustling cityscape.

Savour hearty global fare at Market Cafe or indulge in bold local cuisine at Yu Yue, where classic Chongqing flavours come alive. Rejuvenate at the tranquil spa, swim a few laps in the indoor pool, or simply sip tea in the lounge as the city pulses outside. With attractions like the Three Gorges Museum and the Great Hall of the People nearby, this is your perfect launchpad to exploring Chongqing.
offer_address: 11 Paradise Walk, Jiangbei Dis, Chongqing, Sichuan 400020, China

title: Crowne Plaza Chongqing Jiefangbei - IHG LPP
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chongqing Jiefangbei, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 101 Minzu Avenue, Yuzhong District, Chongqing, 400010, Mainland China

title: Five-Star China Escape with Spectacular Viewing Deck & Five Onsite Restaurants
description: Throw yourself into Chongqing's beautiful culture and admire the city's breathtaking architecture and geography from the InterContinental Chongqing Raffles City, an IHG Hotel. This sophisticated retreat offers a luxurious getaway to explore the city from above with its stunning viewing platform and futuristic design. Take a dip in the exquisite pool which overlooks the city, or dine in one of the five onsite restaurants, all offering a unique dining experience.
location_description: InterContinental Chongqing Raffles City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 2 Changjiang Binjiang Road, Yuzhong District, Chongqing, 400010, Mainland China

title: Elegant Modern Escape in Chongqing with Sparkling City & River Views
description: Escape to China’s glowing Chongqing city with a luxurious stay at voco Chongqing Chaotianmen, an IHG Hotel, situated on the banks of the Jialing River. This charismatic city is home to dramatic landscapes, with a combination of stunning architecture and blissful river scenes, and praised for its fantastic variety of foodie flavours. You’ll find yourself becoming lost in the sprawling streets as you discover historic monuments built in traditional Chinese style, and savour endless authentic cuisine.
location_description: voco Chongqing Chaotianmen, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 Xinhua Road, Yuzhong District, Chongqing 400062, China

title: Five-Star Chongqing Urban Escape Overlooking Jialing River
description: Overlooking the soothing Jialing River, the Regent Chongqing is a tranquil retreat in the heart of this contemporary Chinese city. Savour fine dining at the onsite restaurants, sample blazing Sichuan cuisine at authentic street-side stalls or indulge in an ice-cold cocktail at the River Terrace bar. Spend indulgent days exploring refined boutiques, enjoy a soothing treatment at the Regent Spa or retire to a sumptuous guest room for a tranquil moment gazing out over Chongqing's cityscape.
offer_address: 66th Jinshamen Road, Jianbei District, Chongqing 400021, China
